doc:
Joseph Kramm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Kramm 0 Joseph A. Kramm (30 September 1907, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania – 8 May 1991) was an American playwright, actor, and director. He received Pulitzer Prize for Drama in 1951 for his play The Shrike, later adapted into a motion picture of the same title in 1955. Joseph_A._Kramm ( 30_September_1907 , Philadelphia , Pennsylvania – 8_May_1991 ) was an_American_playwright , actor , and director . He received Pulitzer_Prize for Drama in 1951 for his play The_Shrike , later adapted into a_motion_picture of the_same_title in 1955 .
